text: Armin Mahović (born November 28, 1991) is a Bosnian footballer who plays for Austrian Regionalliga club SK Bischofshofen. == Playing career == Mahović began his career in 2008 in the First League of Bosnia and Herzegovina with Olimpic Sarajevo. The following season he was transferred to play in the Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina with NK Zeljeznicar. After a season with Zeljeznicar he returned to the First League of Bosnia and Herzegovina to play with FK Famos Hrasnica. Throughout his time in the First League of Bosnia and Herzegovina he played with NK Bratstvo Gračanica, FK Goražde, HNK Čapljina, and FK Rudar Kakanj. In 2014, he returned to the Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina to play with NK Travnik, and later with FK Goražde. In 2015, he played abroad in the Canadian Soccer League with Brantford Galaxy. After a season abroad he returned to Olimpic Sarajevo, and played in the Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina. In 2017, he played with Borac Banja Luka. == References == Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:People from Sarajevo Category:Association football forwards Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:FK Olimpik players Category:FK Željezničar players Category:FK Famos Hrasnica players Category:FK Goražde players Category:HNK Čapljina players Category:FK Rudar Kakanj players Category:NK Travnik players Category:Brantford Galaxy players Category:FK Borac Banja Luka players Category:Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina players Category:Austrian Regionalliga players Category:Canadian Soccer League (2006–present) players Category:Expatriate soccer players in Canada Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria
title: Armin Mahović
